text: Pirmin Schwegler (born 9 March 1987) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a midfielder. He has played for FC Luzern, Young Boys, Bayer Leverkusen, Eintracht Frankfurt, 1899 Hoffenheim, Hannover 96, Western Sydney Wanderers, and the Switzerland national team. Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:2010 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Lucerne
title: Pirmin Schwegler
